mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: Francis H. Pierpont Civil War Telegrams
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Moore, Alexander C.
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Gov FH Peirpoint [Francis H. Pierpont] Wheeling Oct 25 1862. By Telegraph from Clarksburg 25 1862. Sergt Nixon has been ordered to Wheeling by Liut Buffington. Please have him to remain with us we have just commenced drilling answer Alx. C. Moore Capt Co E 1st Va Artillery 23 Do 74 pd
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Moore, Alexander C.
Clarksburg, (West) Virginia
Wheeling, (West) Virginia
Pierpont, Francis Harrison
